commands.description: Display a detailed list of all current buy and sell orders in desktop format, has all info
Display a compact version of this help message.
List an item for sale: !sell [item name/ref] [quality] [quantity] [price modifier]
List a buy order: !buy [item name/ref] [quality] [quantity] [price modifier]
Display all current buy and sell orders in mobile format
Clear all orders from the sales list (Admin only).
List an item at fixed price: !sell.fixed [item name/ref] [quality] [quantity] [fixed price]
List a buy order at fixed price: !buy.fixed [item name/ref] [quality] [quantity] [fixed price]
